summary: This is a forwarded email from Lesley Groff to an unspecified recipient, confirming an appointment for Jeffrey Epstein at his New York City residence on July 8, 2010. It serves as evidence of Epstein's scheduling and his residential address.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Sent an email to an unspecified recipient to schedule an appointment for Jeffrey Epstein at his home.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual for whom an appointment at his New York City home is being scheduled.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is scheduling an appointment on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional or staff relationship.

events.title: Scheduled Appointment at Epstein's Home
events.description: An appointment was scheduled for Jeffrey Epstein at his New York City residence at 5:00 PM.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY (between 5th and Madison Avenues)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence was confirmed as 9 East 71st Street.
An appointment was scheduled for Epstein at his home on July 8, 2010, at 5:00 PM.
Lesley Groff acted as a scheduler or assistant for Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is a piece of correspondence from June 29, 2010, confirming future plans.
